00005 """Python module for generating .ninja files.
00006 
00007 Note that this is emphatically not a required piece of Ninja; it's
00008 just a helpful utility for build-file-generation systems that already
00009 use Python.
00010 """
00011 
00012 import textwrap
00013 import re
00014 
00015 def escape_path(word):
00016     return word.replace('$ ','$$ ').replace(' ','$ ').replace(':', '$:')
00017 
00018 class Writer(object):
00019     def __init__(self, output, width=78):
00020         self.output = output
00021         self.width = width
00022 
00023     def newline(self):
00024         self.output.write('\n')
00025 
00026     def comment(self, text):
00027         for line in textwrap.wrap(text, self.width - 2):
00028             self.output.write('# ' + line + '\n')
00029 
00030     def variable(self, key, value, indent=0):
00031         if value is None:
00032             return
00033         if isinstance(value, list):
00034             value = ' '.join(filter(None, value))  # Filter out empty strings.
00035         self._line('%s = %s' % (key, value), indent)
00036 
00037     def pool(self, name, depth):
00038         self._line('pool %s' % name)
00039         self.variable('depth', depth, indent=1)
00040 
00041     def rule(self, name, command, description=None, depfile=None,
00042              generator=False, pool=None, restat=False, rspfile=None,
00043              rspfile_content=None, deps=None):
00044         self._line('rule %s' % name)
00045         self.variable('command', command, indent=1)
00046         if description:
00047             self.variable('description', description, indent=1)
00048         if depfile:
00049             self.variable('depfile', depfile, indent=1)
00050         if generator:
00051             self.variable('generator', '1', indent=1)
00052         if pool:
00053             self.variable('pool', pool, indent=1)
00054         if restat:
00055             self.variable('restat', '1', indent=1)
00056         if rspfile:
00057             self.variable('rspfile', rspfile, indent=1)
00058         if rspfile_content:
00059             self.variable('rspfile_content', rspfile_content, indent=1)
00060         if deps:
00061             self.variable('deps', deps, indent=1)
00062 
00063     def build(self, outputs, rule, inputs=None, implicit=None, order_only=None,
00064               variables=None):
00065         outputs = self._as_list(outputs)
00066         all_inputs = self._as_list(inputs)[:]
00067         out_outputs = list(map(escape_path, outputs))
00068         all_inputs = list(map(escape_path, all_inputs))
00069 
00070         if implicit:
00071             implicit = map(escape_path, self._as_list(implicit))
00072             all_inputs.append('|')
00073             all_inputs.extend(implicit)
00074         if order_only:
00075             order_only = map(escape_path, self._as_list(order_only))
00076             all_inputs.append('||')
00077             all_inputs.extend(order_only)
00078 
00079         self._line('build %s: %s' % (' '.join(out_outputs),
00080                                         ' '.join([rule] + all_inputs)))
00081 
00082         if variables:
00083             if isinstance(variables, dict):
00084                 iterator = iter(variables.items())
00085             else:
00086                 iterator = iter(variables)
00087 
00088             for key, val in iterator:
00089                 self.variable(key, val, indent=1)
00090 
00091         return outputs
00092 
00093     def include(self, path):
00094         self._line('include %s' % path)
00095 
00096     def subninja(self, path):
00097         self._line('subninja %s' % path)
00098 
00099     def default(self, paths):
00100         self._line('default %s' % ' '.join(self._as_list(paths)))
00101 
00102     def _count_dollars_before_index(self, s, i):
00103       """Returns the number of '$' characters right in front of s[i]."""
00104       dollar_count = 0
00105       dollar_index = i - 1
00106       while dollar_index > 0 and s[dollar_index] == '$':
00107         dollar_count += 1
00108         dollar_index -= 1
00109       return dollar_count
00110 
00111     def _line(self, text, indent=0):
00112         """Write 'text' word-wrapped at self.width characters."""
00113         leading_space = '  ' * indent
00114         while len(leading_space) + len(text) > self.width:
00115             # The text is too wide; wrap if possible.
00116 
00117             # Find the rightmost space that would obey our width constraint and
00118             # that's not an escaped space.
00119             available_space = self.width - len(leading_space) - len(' $')
00120             space = available_space
00121             while True:
00122               space = text.rfind(' ', 0, space)
00123               if space < 0 or \
00124                  self._count_dollars_before_index(text, space) % 2 == 0:
00125                 break
00126 
00127             if space < 0:
00128                 # No such space; just use the first unescaped space we can find.
00129                 space = available_space - 1
00130                 while True:
00131                   space = text.find(' ', space + 1)
00132                   if space < 0 or \
00133                      self._count_dollars_before_index(text, space) % 2 == 0:
00134                     break
00135             if space < 0:
00136                 # Give up on breaking.
00137                 break
00138 
00139             self.output.write(leading_space + text[0:space] + ' $\n')
00140             text = text[space+1:]
00141 
00142             # Subsequent lines are continuations, so indent them.
00143             leading_space = '  ' * (indent+2)
00144 
00145         self.output.write(leading_space + text + '\n')
00146 
00147     def _as_list(self, input):
00148         if input is None:
00149             return []
00150         if isinstance(input, list):
00151             return input
00152         return [input]
00153 
00154 
00155 def escape(string):
00156     """Escape a string such that it can be embedded into a Ninja file without
00157     further interpretation."""
00158     assert '\n' not in string, 'Ninja syntax does not allow newlines'
00159     # We only have one special metacharacter: '$'.
00160     return string.replace('$', '$$')
